metadata.title: CVE-2017-12132 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The DNS stub resolver in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) before version 2.26, when EDNS support is enabled, will solicit large UDP responses from name servers, potentially simplifying off-path DNS spoofing attacks due to IP fragmentation.

criterions.comment: glibc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26-0ubuntu2').
